node.title: Late Night Praises Fox News Hosts for Their Acting Skills
node.alt: Stephen Colbert joked that Mark Meadows “even got an Instagram post from Judge Jeanine’s box of wine.”
node.description: The news that Fox News anchors sent texts on Jan. 6 urging President Trump to speak out against the insurrection while blaming antifa on air was the talk of late night on Tuesday.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "Late night was aflutter on Tuesday with the revelations that the Fox News commentators Brian Kilmeade, Sean Hannity and Laura Ingraham sent pleading texts to Mark Meadows on Jan. 6, asking President Donald J. Trump to speak out and stop the insurrection.", "Stephen Colbert joked that Meadows, Trump\u2019s last chief of staff, \u201ceven got an Instagram post from Judge Jeanine\u2019s box of wine.\u201d", "Will Forte joined his friend and former \u201cSaturday Night Live\u201d co-star Seth Meyers for some day drinking on Tuesday\u2019s \u201cLate Night.\u201d", "\u201cThe Late Show\u201d will celebrate the 20th anniversary of \u201cLord of the Rings.\u201d", "John Cameron Mitchell takes inspiration from New Orleans, modern fairy tales and Mavis Staples."]
